locked.description: This pipeline is maintained by spinnaker as a code, any changes made through the ui will be overwritten

parameterConfig.description: Version of the Integration Chart that holds the new microservice
parameterConfig.label: INT_CHART_VERSION
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_VERSION

parameterConfig.description: Repo of the Integration Chart that holds the new microservice
parameterConfig.label: INT_CHART_REPO
parameterConfig.name: INT_CHART_REPO

parameterConfig.description: Full path to the helmfile yaml file within the extracted product helfile archive.
parameterConfig.label: PATH_TO_HELMFILE
parameterConfig.name: PATH_TO_HELMFILE

parameterConfig.description: Site values file used to generate what CSAR are to be built
parameterConfig.label: STATE_VALUES_FILE
parameterConfig.name: STATE_VALUES_FILE

parameterConfig.description: SLAVE_LABEL to run CSAR build on
parameterConfig.label: SLAVE_LABEL
parameterConfig.name: SLAVE_LABEL

parameterConfig.description: ID of the Function User that has been stored on the Jenkins server in the credentials area as a username and password
parameterConfig.label: FUNCTIONAL_USER_SECRET
parameterConfig.name: FUNCTIONAL_USER_SECRET

parameterConfig.description: Secret ID that stores the ARM Docker Credentials.
parameterConfig.label: ARMDOCKER_USER_SECRET
parameterConfig.name: ARMDOCKER_USER_SECRET

stages.name: Build PM Stats Handling Config CSAR
stages.refId: Build PM Stats Handling Config CSAR

stages.name: Check Preconditions for CSARs

context.expression: "${#stage('Build UDS CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build UDS CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build DMM CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build DMM CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build EAS CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build EAS CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build TH CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build TH CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Config-Handling CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Config-Handling CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build ADC CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build ADC CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build App-Mgr CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build App-Mgr CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Service-Mesh-Integration CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Service-Mesh-Integration CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Oran Support CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Oran Support CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build PM Stats Handling Config CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build PM Stats Handling Config CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build EVNFM - Container')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build EVNFM - Container')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build EVNFM - VM')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build EVNFM - VM')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Cloud Manager')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Cloud Manager')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Cloud Manager EDA')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Cloud Manager EDA')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build ERIC MESH CONTROLLER CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build ERIC MESH CONTROLLER CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build CLM CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build CLM CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build OSS Function Orch Common CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build OSS Function Orch Common CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build ECA CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build ECA CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Cloud-Native-Service-Mesh')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Cloud-Native-Service-Mesh')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Core Assurance Augmentation')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Core Assurance Augmentation')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Core Assurance Visualisation')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Core Assurance Visualisation')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Core Assurance Indexer')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Core Assurance Indexer')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Eric-OSS-ML-Execution-Env')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Eric-OSS-ML-Execution-Env')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build CN Base OSS Config CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build CN Base OSS Config CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Connected Systems Registry')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Connected Systems Registry')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build EO Lifecycle Manager')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build EO Lifecycle Manager')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build SEP CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build SEP CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build SEF CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build SEF CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build TIEH CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build TIEH CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Topology Exposure Handling CSAR')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Topology Exposure Handling CSAR')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EO')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EO')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EIC')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EIC')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EO cCM')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Build Helmfile CSAR - EO cCM')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"

requisiteStageRefIds: Build PM Stats Handling Config CSAR
Build OSS Function Orch Common CSAR
Build CN Base OSS Config CSAR

stages.name: Evaluate Site Values for EO cCM
stages.refId: Evaluate Site Values for EO cCM

stages.name: Check Preconditions for Site Values

context.expression: "${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for IDUN')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for IDUN')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EO cCM')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EO cCM')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EOOM')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EOOM')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"
"${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EO')['status']}" == "SUCCEEDED" or "${#stage('Evaluate Site Values for EO')['status']}" == "SKIPPED"

requisiteStageRefIds: Evaluate Site Values for EO cCM
